Stop-loss strategy: Trigger a sell order when ROE falls below -20% or DBR exceeds 90%
Sell when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price or when the EPS (earnings per share) becomes negative for two consecutive years.
[Close below 60, or if ROE falls below -20%]
Sell if the stock price drops by 15% from the buying price or when the ROE/ROA ratio falls below -10%
